EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Nancy - 1A
EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
Thank you for your recent interest in Teladoc Health. As the global leader in virtual care, the Teladoc Health solution uniquely spans telehealth, mental health, expert medical services, dermatology, guidance, and support services with a vast network of board-certified physicians extensively trained in virtual care delivery.
We would love to discuss your virtual healthcare strategy, and how we can help you drive greater telehealth engagement. To begin our introduction, please feel free to directly schedule a 15-minute call here: https://calendly.com/nancy-sale-teladoc/discovery-call?utm_campaign=atmd-lead-outreach&utm_medium=email&utm_source=marketo&utm_content=email-1a
Regards, Nancy
Nancy Sale, BSN, RN Product Awareness Specialist Teladoc Health, Inc.
nancy.sale@teladochealth.com
Livongo is now part of Teladoc Health, the global leader in virtual care.
